content: PyRTL Bug #12: Fix the PyRTL execution error in this code. Error: Traceback (most recent call last):
context: PyRTL programming bug fix: PyRTL execution error
faulty_code:
import pyrtl

# Simple half adder with missing wire assignment

# Input wires
a = pyrtl.Input(1, 'a')
b = pyrtl.Input(1, 'b')

# Output wires
sum_out = pyrtl.Output(1, 'sum')
carry_out = pyrtl.Output(1, 'carry')

# Connect sum output
sum_out <<= a ^ b

# Bug: Missing assignment to carry_out
# carry_out <<= a & b
fixed_code:
import pyrtl

# Simple half adder with correct wire assignments

# Input wires
a = pyrtl.Input(1, 'a')
b = pyrtl.Input(1, 'b')

# Output wires
sum_out = pyrtl.Output(1, 'sum')
carry_out = pyrtl.Output(1, 'carry')

# Connect outputs
sum_out <<= a ^ b
carry_out <<= a & b
embedding_text:
PyRTL programming bug fix: PyRTL execution error import pyrtl

# Simple half adder with missing wire assignment

# Input wires
a = pyrtl.Input(1, 'a')
b = pyrtl.Input(1, 'b')

# Output wires
sum_out = pyrtl.Output(1, 'sum')
carry_out = pyrtl.Output(1, 'carry')

# Connect sum output
sum_out <<= a ^ b

# Bug: Missing assignment to carry_out
# carry_out <<= a & b
